alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:00PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN LIMESTONE COUNTIES... At 759 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harvest, or 9 miles west of Meridianville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Athens, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, New Market, Harvest, Toney, Elkwood and Plevna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central, northeastern and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
